title: Beautiful 4 Bed in a Fantastic Somerville Location
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $4,200 / Month
Beds: 4
Bath: 1.5
Available Date: 09/01/2022
Pet: Negotiable
Newly renovated 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit located in Somerville.
Unit is just an easy walk to both Harvard and Porter Square, grocery stores, various shops, restaurants, and public transportation.
Convenient, brand new, in unit laundry.
Dogs are OK for an additional $100 per month upon owner approval.
Cats OK for an additional $50 per month.
Security deposit is negotiable.
Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!
